price: Or are you asking them [O Prophet] for a reward so they are overburdened by debt?
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qalūna
